snippet.title: Runner Runner
snippet.description: It reads like good, pulpy fun on paper: Professional charmer Justin Timberlake plays a Princeton math whiz who falls under the Gordon Gekko-ish spell ofâ€¦

snippet.title: Sand and Deliver: 20 Great Beach Scenes
snippet.description: Movies to put sand between your toes: Some for fun (''Beach Blanket Bingo,'' ''Some Like It Hot''), some with bite (''Jaws,'' ''The Seventh Seal'')

snippet.title: 24 Stars' Worst Movies
snippet.description: Angelina Jolie as ''Cyborg''? Paul Rudd as peroxide-blond ''Gen-Y Cop''? Daniel Craig as a ''Mr. Miyagi'' type? Faves in roles you won't believe!

snippet.title: The ABCs of 'Sex'
snippet.description: EW has compiled everything you need to know about the HBO hit...in handy alphabetical order
